title: Things making you lose memory - 6 weird things making you lose memory | The Times of India
text:
6 weird things making you lose memory Feburary 08, 2017 1 /7 Things making you lose memory 
We all have been told often what is good for your body is also good for your mind. That's the reason doctors say that a well balanced diet and exercise is good for the brain and helps considerably in bringing down the risk of Alzheimer's disease as you age. 
However, there are some factors that may affect your memory before age catches up. Here are some that may surprise you: All Comments ()
